snippet: A United Nations agency has warned that Gaza may become uninhabitable by 2020 if current political and economic trends continue.
abstract: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development reports Gaza's crippled economy, devastated infrastructure and mass unemployment might make area, home to 1.8 million people, uninhabitable by 2020; conflict with Israel last year escalated already grim conditions.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations agency has warned that Gaza may become uninhabitable by 2020 if current political and economic trends continue.

headline.main: Gaza: U.N. Issues Warning About Living Conditions
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Gaza: U.N. Issues Warning About Living Conditions

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development
